title: pArttu paravashamAnEn
sahitya:
pArttu paravashamAnEn ammA paNDiya mannanin paingkiLiyE unnaip-


anupallavi

  pAr pugazhum pani malai magaLE ingu vEru yArukku enaiyanri unadaruLE pugalE


caraNam    kiLi tAngum undan valak-karattin azhagum pazhagiya pErukkun varam tarum tirup-pAdam
vizhiyAlE karuNai mazhai pozhiginranai ezhilOngum tayyalE enaik-kaN pArAyO
